content.question: An airplane flies horizontally to the right with a constant velocity directly over an observer standing on the ground, as shown in the figure. Which of the following describes the magnitude <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math> of the airplane’s angular momentum about the observer’s position as the airplane flies between positions <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math>, <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>, and <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>C</mtext></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math> is the same at points <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math>, <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>, and <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>C</mtext></math>.

<math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math> increases from Point <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math> to Point <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>, then decreases from Point <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math> to Point <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>C</mtext></math>.

<math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math> decreases from Point <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math> to Point <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>, then increases from Point <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math> to Point <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>C</mtext></math>.
<math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math> cannot be compared for the positions shown because angular momentum is undefined for an object moving in a straight line.

content.answer: <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math> is the same at points <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math>, <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>, and <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>C</mtext></math>.
